doc:
Michael Gross (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Gross_(actor) 0 Michael Edward Gross (born June 21, 1947) is an American television, movie and stage actor. He has played both comedic and dramatic roles, such as Steven Keaton from the sitcom Family Ties (1982–89) and the graboid hunter Burt Gummer from the Tremors film franchise. Michael_Edward_Gross ( born June_21_,_1947 ) is an_American_television_,_movie_and_stage_actor . He has_played both_comedic_and_dramatic_roles , such_as Steven_Keaton from the_sitcom_Family_Ties_(_1982 – 89_) and the_graboid_hunter_Burt_Gummer from the_Tremors_film_franchise .
